creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: wooden carving of a figure diving to catch a chicken; figure is dressed in black and white and has his skin painted with a similar theme; figure has his eyes squeezed closed and his tongue sticks out in concentration; his red boots stick up into the air behind him; he holds a fleeing chicken in his PR hand; chicken is white with a red comb and has his beak open
title: Chicken Thief
